name: Blacked Out [Facebook Dark Theme]
description:
**FIREFOX ONLY**

A darkened Facebook theme that flows quite nicely. This theme is pretty boss muffins.
additional_info:
Thanks to 'elusive for the wallpaper. http://elusive.deviantart.com/art/Splinter-66395474

LET me know if you're experiencing any issues, I'll try to fix them when I can.


I coded everything from scratch so there's probably flaws...

I made this theme because honestly most of the ones that are on Userstyles.org are outdated and/or the theme is incomplete and doesn't work well. I wanted a Facebook experience that actually worked nicely in a dark environment. I think this theme does that fairly well.

If you modify/use my code, please link to me in your credits (you don't need permission). Thanks!


--UPDATES/FIXES--

5/16/2012** Left Side Scrollable; Menu Transparency Issues
5/15/2012** Notification icons; Photo previews
1/9/2012** Photo album fix; Added 1px borders to images
1/8/2012** Sharing feature; Alignment issues; Theatre mode; Smaller Edges; Subscribe/friend buttons
1/7/2012** Log-in screen; Alignment issues; Timeline Ads; Fixed search

--TO DO--
Minor Aesthetic Adjustments
??? Chrome support ???
